com.oss.teamwork.teamshare.messaging
Interface Mailbox

public interface Mailbox

Implements a user's mailbox, a repository-type element, providing the set of Message objects sent or received by an user.

Method Summary
 void addMessage(Message msg)
          Adds a new message to the mailbox.
 void addMessages(java.util.List<Message> messages)
          Adds newly received or sent messages to the mailbox.
 java.util.List<Message> getMessages(MessageQuery query)
          Returns a list of messages of the logged-in user based on the given query criteria.
 void removeMessage(Message msg)
          Removes (deletes) a message from the mailbox.
 void updateMessageStatus(Message msg, MessageStatus newStatus)
          Updates the message's status (read/unread), see also MessageStatus
 

Method Detail

getMessages

java.util.List<Message> getMessages(MessageQuery query)
Returns a list of messages of the logged-in user based on the given query criteria.

Parameters:
query - - filtering constraints for the list of messages (certain interval, certain destination etc)
Returns:
a list of Message objects

addMessage

void addMessage(Message msg)
Adds a new message to the mailbox.

addMessages

void addMessages(java.util.List<Message> messages)
Adds newly received or sent messages to the mailbox.

removeMessage

void removeMessage(Message msg)
Removes (deletes) a message from the mailbox.

Parameters:
msg - - the message to be deleted

updateMessageStatus

void updateMessageStatus(Message msg,
                         MessageStatus newStatus)
Updates the message's status (read/unread), see also MessageStatus

Parameters:
msg - - the message whose status to updated
newStatus - - the message's new status
